remarks.para: This form is preloaded with the credentials from the default credential record.
The user can change these credentials to access other DBs or with other user credentials.

member.name: T:SySal.Executables.QuickDataCheck.ExeForm
member.summary: QuickDataCheck - GUI program for data check and analysis.

remarks.para:
QuickDataCheck is able to read data files in the following formats:
SySal RWD
SySal TLG
SySal TSR
Generic ASCII n-tuple file
In addition, datasets from DB queries can be handled.
QuickDataCheck supports all features from the StatisticalAnalysisManager. Actually, the main form is an instance of that control.
A scripting engine allows editing and execution of analysis scripts with C-like syntax or Pascal-like syntax.

member.name: T:SySal.Executables.QuickDataCheck.QuickQueryForm
member.summary: Query form to retrieve datasets from DBs.

remarks.para: The form allows insertion of an SQL query text.
The dataset generated can be given a custom name for identification.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

remarks.para: Data management and analysis scripts can be edited and run in this form.
Any script action is handled as if it were executed interactively by the user on the ExeForm.
C-like syntax and Pascal-like syntax are supported.
Specific help for the various functions available is displayed by clicking on each possible function name on the right panel.
Scripts can be saved and loaded.
